string.text: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

Reece Parkinson is in the Caribbean for an incredible adventure. First up, Reece heads to the Dominican Republic to explore the country's intoxicating mix of cultures, and discover how locals are protecting their stunning marine environment.
Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.
The team explores the global race to get clean aviation off the ground. Plus, they visit the Faroe Islands to explore the new technologies harnessing tidal power.
Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.
Investigating Egypt's trade in jasmine and uncovering the perfume industry's dark secrets.
